column2:
(n) ...s = population
- A particular sector of a population:
eg: the drink is popular with a young demographic

(n) 
- Understanding of a situation or event only after it has happened or developed:
eg: with ..., I should never have gone
(n) sự dính líu; ẩn ý; hậu quả
(n) sự đầu cơ chung giữa hai hoặc nhiều bên.

(n) độc quyền
- the state's ... of radio and television broadcasting

(adj) không theo tôn giáo nào, vô thần
(n) ethnicity

(adj) kỳ lạ, kỳ cục, đẹp kỳ lạ, ngoại lai
- Originating in or characteristic of a distant foreign country:
eg: they loved to visit exotic places
- Attractive or striking because colourful or out of the ordinary.

(adj) sản xuất nhiều
- Producing or able to produce large amounts of goods, crops, or other commodities:
eg: the most productive employees

(adj) đến sau, theo sau; tương lai = in the future
- Coming after something in time; following
eg: the theory was developed subsequent to the earthquake of 1906

(adj) làm sửng sốt, làm kinh ngạc
eg: the past 40 years have seen ... developments.

(adj) sâu sắc, thăm thẳm; uyên thâm (kiến thức).
- very great or intense; very deep
(adj) buồn cười, tức cười, lố bịch
(v) bớt, giảm bớt, hạ bớt, thu nhỏ.

(pharase) để ý đến, cứu xét đến (vấn đề nào đó quan trọng)
- To make accurate predictions we need to take into account the effect people have on their environment.
